messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Sensors indicate there is a loose Tesla. Stop recalling that fucking shuttle and run before you die
